issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fixVersions.description: Issues that need to be reviewed - do we keep 'em or do we kick 'em?
fixVersions.name: NEEDS_REVIEW

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Two brokers A <-> B. 

1. B subscribes to x.a and x.>. 
2. A registers subscription x.a in ConduitBridge
3. A examines subscription x.> in ConduitBridge:
* A DestinationFilter is created for x.>
* The filter matches the old subscription for x.a
* Consumer B is added as "interested" in x.a
4. Consumer on B will only receive messages for x.a, but not x.b.
fields.summary: ConduitBridge merges destinations x.a and x.>, resulting in loss of subscription
